ModMetaData.name: Holsters
ModMetaData.author: Iwo Rosiak
ModMetaData.description:
Thank you for downloading my mod! You are amazing!
To report any issues please refer to the mod page :D
<size=22>Overview:</size> - Equipped items are displayed at all times just like apparel adding to the immersive aspects of the game. - Extensive mod settings allow for adjusting positions of items, so you are not stuck with my default settings! :)
<size=22>Compatibility:</size> This mod can be added to/removed from existing saves without problems.
Have fun with my mod and happy holsteringâ€¦ ;)
